name: Jinn
text:
Uh...You wanted to hear my wish!?
B-But, my own wish is to...

name: Jinn
text:
I've spent my whole life granting other people's wishes.
I can't just come up with one right away...!

name: Jinn
text:
It has always been about others.
And, right now... only wishes for you come to mind.
If that's alright with you...

name: Jinn
text:
My wish is... for you to grow up healthy.
Good or evil, it doesn't matter. Just grow into an adult...

name: Jinn
text:
...Daaaah, this isn't like me at all!
You got a problem with that, dammit!?

options.text: I like how it's just like you, teach.
I wonder if that's really enough~?
Don't you want a master you can serve forever?

name: Jinn
text:
Wh... You, what are you even...!
Do you even realize what you're saying!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ugh, n-no, [Player], this...
The roles are reversed here—!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I mean, it's not like one is above the other, but...
We... still have to be teacher and student...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
(Dammit, I can't just pull away...!
I've been searching for this the whole time.)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
(A master for my power, a master I might one day kneel before.
So this is what it feels like... to have a wish granted.)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Hey. What's with that unsatisfactory look on your face?
Be satisfied with that for now, you're still a student!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'm the teacher, and you're the student.
No matter what academy you go to, I'm not giving that up until you graduate!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
So... until you graduate, I'll be your teacher.
And even after that, you'll always be my student.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
But if you want to jump over that wall, then wait for that time.
And then, show me you've become a master worthy of handling me.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jinn
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'm looking forward to it, you hear?
My future... Master.

text:
The festival ends, and the clamor fades away.
The white snow quietly deepens the night as it mixes with the darkness.

But the fire lit in that room shows no sign of fading.
Like a sauna, a quiet heat begins to fill the space.

Perhaps, that hot wind racing across the desert will one day find its master.
Or perhaps, it will head toward a future where it becomes an Evil God.

The crossroads are yet still unclear. But, all that is known,
is that on this cold night, that room is warmer than anywhere else—
